column3: EWURADZE ne da reba a wɔbɛkyɛ w'asadze mu wɔ wo finimfin."

column2: "Na mobɔboa amanaman nyina ano aba Jerusalɛm do nye no abɔko; na wɔbɛfa kurow no
column3: na wɔafom efiefi no
column4: na wɔatoto mbaa no mbɔndar: na kurow no fa botu akɔ ndɔmmum mu
column5: na ɔman no nkaase no dze worunntwitwa hɔn mmfi kurow no mu."

column3: na ɔnye amanaman no akɔko
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkoe wɔ nkoda mu no."

column3: n'anan besisi Ngo bepɔw no a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm tsentsendo wɔ boka afamu no do
column4: na Ngo bepɔw no bɛpaa ebien wɔ ne finimfin fi boka afamu dze ekesi anee afamu
column5: na ɔayɛ bɔnsa kɛsenara; na bepɔw no ne fa bɔtwe akɔ kwaamu afamu
column6: na ne fa so atwe akɔ pomu afamu."

column2: "Na hom boguanguan afa me mbepɔw no no bɔnsaa no mu; na me bepɔw no no bɔnsaa no bodu Azel: ɛhɛɛ
column3: hom boguanguan
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hom guanguanee wɔ asaasewosow enyim wɔ Judahen Uzia nda mu no: na EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn bɛba
column5: na akrɔnkrɔmfo nyina bɛka wo ho."

column3: ɔbɛba dɛ awɔw yayaayaw biara nnkɛba:"

column2: "na adzekyee so bɛyɛ kor a EWURADZE na onyim; ɔnnyɛ adzekyee
column3: na ɔnnyɛ adzesaa so: na ɔbɛba dɛ ewimbir no na kan bɛba."
ɔbɛba dɛ nkwa nsu befi Jerusalɛm apem; no mu fa akɔ boka afamu po no mu
column4: na no mu fa so akɔ anee afamu po no mu: ɔpɛber na awɔwber mu na ɔbɛba."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bedzi hen wɔ asaase no nyina do: da no mu na EWURADZE bɛda noho edzi dɛ EWURADZE kor no ara
column3: na ne dzin so yɛ soronko."
efi Geba ekesi Rimmon wɔ Jerusalɛm pomu afamu; na ɔbɔkrɔn
column5: dze efi Benjamin abobokɛse no ano dze ekesi odzi kan no ho
column6: dze ekesi kutuwdo abobokɛse no ano
column7: na efi Hananel abantsentsen no ho dze ekesi ɔhen ne nsatwer no ho."

column3: na ndom biara remmba hɔ bio; na mbom Jerusalɛm bɛtsena dwudwoodwo."

column2: "Na ɔyardɔm a EWURADZE dze bɔbɔ amanaman a woetu Jerusalɛm do sa no nyina nye iyi: ber a wogyinagyina hɔn anan do no
column3: hɔn honam bɔprɔw
column4: na hɔn enyiwa so aprɔw wɔ hɔn etu mu
column5: na hɔn tɛkyerɛma aprɔw wɔ hɔn anomu."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba wɔ da no mu dɛ weɔɔweɔɔyɛ kɛse fi EWURADZE hɔ bɛba hɔn mu; na hɔn mu obiara bosuo ne nyɛnko ne nsamu
column3: na ne nsa ama do etsia ne nyɛnko nsa."

column2: "Na Juda so nye Jerusalɛm bɔko; na wɔbɔboaboa amanaman a etwa ehyia nyina hɔn ahonya ano
column3: sika
asoasopɔnkɔ
column6: na mbowa a wɔwɔ nsera mu no hɔn yardɔm bɛyɛ dɛ yardɔm yi ara."

column3: amanaman a wotuu Jerusalɛm do sa no nyinara mu dza aka no nyinara bɔfow aba

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ asaase do mbusua nyinara mu hɔn a wɔnnkɔfow aba Jerusalɛm abɔkotow asɔr Ɔhen
column3: dɔm EWURADZE no

column2: "Na sɛ Egypt ebusua ammfow annkɔ ammba a
column3: ɔronntɔ hɔn do; yardɔm a EWURADZE dze bɔbɔ amanaman a wɔnnkɔfow aba abɛhyɛ ntamadan afahyɛ no ɔbɛba hɔ."

column2: "Iyi bɛyɛ Egypt na amanaman a wɔnnkɔfow aba abɛhyɛ ntamadan afahyɛ no nyinara hɔn ntsea."

column3: wɔbɛkyerɛw no wɔ mpɔnkɔ ndɔndɔmba do dɛ
column4: KRƆNKRƆN MA EWURADZE na EWURADZE fie nkutu bɛyɛ dɛ afɔrmbukyia enyim ndweraa."

column3: nkutu a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm na Juda mu nyina bɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn ama dɔm EWURADZE: na hɔn a wɔbɔ okum afɔr nyina bɛba abɛfa mu bi akɔnoa adze wɔ mu: na da no mu no Keenannyi biara renntsena dɔm EWURADZE fie bio."
